original_text: In the mountain of the height of Israel will I plant it: and it shall bring forth boughs, and bear fruit, and be a goodly cedar: and under it shall dwell all fowl of every wing; in the shadow of the branches thereof shall they dwell.
korean_text: 이스라엘 높은 산에 심으리니 그 가지가 무성하고 열매를 맺어서 아름다운 백향목이 될 것이요 각종 새가 그 아래에 깃들이며 그 가지 그늘에 살리라

sentences.original_text: In the mountain of the height of Israel
and it shall bring forth boughs,
and under it shall dwell all fowl of every wing;
sentences.korean_translation: 그 아래 모든 날개를 가진 새가 거하리라

sentences.original_text: in the shadow of the branches thereof
